item.title: CFBarbecue v1.0 Released!
item.description:
I am happy to announce I have released CFBarbecue version 1.0 on RIAForge! CFBarbecue is a ColdFusion wrapper for the Barbecue Barcode Java library, and provides the ability to generate and display barcodes on your web application pages. It also makes scaling and rotating barcodes easy too.

Visit the RIAForge page to download the library. Happy coding!
